file-comment: Copy this file to ../config/settings.json and customize its values. The entire config/ directory is in .gitignore to help avoid uploading api keys etc. git repositories. Any keys, such as this one which ending in -comment are comments ;-) ;-)
settingsVersion-comment: Version for settings file, in case we need it.
uptimeRobotApiKey-comment: Primary uptime robot API key. See https://uptimerobot.com/dashboard.php#mySettings
dest_uptimeRobotApiKey-comment: Another uptime robot API key which acts as destination for a copy operation.
